title:
China names first special envoy on Asian affairs
 - China - Chinadaily.com.cn

organizations.name: Foreign Ministry
quotes: A Foreign Ministry spokeswoman on Monday confirmed the appointment of a former senior diplomat as special representative on Asian affairs.
The government recently appointed Wang Yingfan, a former vice-foreign minister, as the Foreign Ministry's first special representative on Asian affairs,

roles.title: special representative on Asian affairs
quotes: A Foreign Ministry spokeswoman on Monday confirmed the appointment of a former senior diplomat as special representative on Asian affairs.

roles.title: former vice-foreign minister
quotes: The government recently appointed Wang Yingfan, a former vice-foreign minister, as the Foreign Ministry's first special representative on Asian affairs
BEIJING - A Foreign Ministry spokeswoman on Monday confirmed the appointment of a former senior diplomat as special representative on Asian affairs.
Wang will be largely responsible for handling issues between China and Myanmar, she said.
Wang will be largely responsible for handling issues between China and Myanmar, she said.
